item.title: Baha Men - Best Years of Our Lives("SHREK")
item.description:
I get such a thrill
when you look
Into my eyes
my heart skips a beat
Because I feel
so alive
Please tell me baby
if all this is true
Because deep down
inside
All I wanted
was you
Oh- it makes me
want to dance
Oh- it’s a
new romance
Oh- I look
into your eyes
Oh- best years
of our lives
When we first met
I could hardly believe
The things
that would happen
And we could
achieve
So let’s be together
for all of our time
Who grow and
so thankful
And you are
still mine
Oh- it makes me
want to dance
Oh- it’s a
new romance
Oh- I look into
your eyes
Oh- best years
of our lives-

My mind was
in a better place
Because I know
your mind
This love is so real
and it’s no surprise
Come on and say yeah
I got a song yeah
Because through
the years
I’ll be right
by your side
Oh- it makes me
want to dance
Oh- it’s a
new romance
Oh- I look into
your eyes
Oh- best years
of our lives
See you always
consider me
A ugly you treat me
like a
You know this is why
I had to get
My shine on I bring
a little something
To keep my mind on
because you had
My mind gone
eh eh eh eh eh eh
Turn the lights on
come on baby
Let’s just rewind
the song
Because all
I want to do is
Make the next years
the best years
All night long oh-
makes me want to dance
Oh- it’s a
new romance

Oh- best years
